verses.verse: But in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> it will happen that the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>temple<s%> will be <S%H3559>established<s%> on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and it will be <S%H5375>exalted<s%> above the <S%H1389>hills;<s%> and <S%H5971>peoples<s%> will stream to <S%H5102>it.<s%>

<S%H7227>Many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3212>"Come,<s%> and let us go <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> and he will <S%H3384>teach<s%> us of his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and we will <S%H3212>walk<s%> in his <S%H734>paths.<s%>" For out of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> will go <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H8451>law,<s%> and the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%>

and he will <S%H8199>judge<s%> between <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> and will <S%H3198>decide<s%> concerning <S%H6099>strong<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> afar <S%H7350>off.<s%> They will <S%H3807>beat<s%> their <S%H2719>swords<s%> into <S%H855>plowshares,<s%> and their <S%H2595>spears<s%> into pruning <S%H4211>hooks.<s%> <S%H1471>Nation<s%> will not lift <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> against <S%H1471>nation,<s%> neither will they <S%H3925>learn<s%> war any <S%H4421>more.<s%>

But they will <S%H3427>sit<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> under his <S%H1612>vine<s%> and under his fig <S%H8384>tree;<s%> and no one will make them <S%H2729>afraid:<s%> For the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

Indeed <S%H376>all<s%> the <S%H5971>nations<s%> may <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of their <S%H430>gods;<s%> but we will <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>

"In that <S%H3117>day,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "I will <S%H622>assemble<s%> that which is <S%H6760>lame,<s%> and I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> that which is driven <S%H5080>away,<s%> and that which I have <S%H7489>afflicted;<s%>

and I will <S%H7760>make<s%> that which was <S%H6760>lame<s%> a <S%H7611>remnant,<s%> and that which was cast far <S%H1972>off<s%> a <S%H6099>strong<s%> <S%H1471>nation:<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H4427>reign<s%> over them on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> from then <S%H5704>on,<s%> even <S%H5769>forever.<s%>"

<S%H4026>You,<s%> tower of the <S%H5739>flock,<s%> the <S%H6076>hill<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> to you it will <S%H857>come,<s%> <S%H7223>yes,<s%> the former <S%H4475>dominion<s%> will <S%H935>come,<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Now why do you <S%H7321>cry<s%> out <S%H7452>aloud?<s%> Is there no <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3289>you?<s%> Has your counselor <S%H6>perished,<s%> that <S%H2427>pains<s%> have <S%H2388>taken<s%> hold of you as of a woman in <S%H3205>travail?<s%>

Be in <S%H2342>pain,<s%> and labor to bring <S%H1518>forth,<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> like a woman in <S%H3205>travail;<s%> for now you will go <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H7151>city,<s%> and will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and will come even to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%> There you will be <S%H5337>rescued.<s%> There <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H1350>redeem<s%> you from the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of your <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

Now <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> have <S%H622>assembled<s%> against <S%H559>you,<s%> that say, "Let her be <S%H2610>defiled,<s%> and let our <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H2372>gloat<s%> over <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>"

But they <S%H3045>don't<s%> know the <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> neither do they <S%H995>understand<s%> his <S%H6098>counsel;<s%> for he has <S%H6908>gathered<s%> them like the <S%H5995>sheaves<s%> to the threshing <S%H1637>floor.<s%>

<S%H6965>Arise<s%> and <S%H1758>thresh,<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> for I will <S%H7760>make<s%> your <S%H7161>horn<s%> <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and I will <S%H7760>make<s%> your <S%H6541>hoofs<s%> <S%H5154>brass;<s%> and you will beat in <S%H1854>pieces<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples:<s%> and I will <S%H2763>devote<s%> their <S%H1215>gain<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and their <S%H2428>substance<s%> to the <S%H113>Lord<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth.<s%>
